name: Followers, Haters & Groups
description:
novakzen explores the relationship between art, science, philosophy, and technology through a group of multidisciplinary artists, engineers, anthropologists, mathematics, architects, software developers… collaborating in the search of innovative languages, and forms of artistic expression to spread our limits.

The collective novakzen present the artwork Followers, Haters & Groups, a video art involved in a retro-futuristic acid aesthetic that talks about the conflicts on social media.

Unique Edition.

Medium: VIDEO 2160x3840, 02:51   loop. (Contact us so that we can send you the original file) 

More info  https://www.instagram.com/novakzen 

Represented by  https://www.instagram.com/onkaos_/
